name: gluttony

effect.sun-moon: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.

short_effect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.
